parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> <comment><!-- local, to be confirmed --></comment>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns unit traits, native or set by [[setUnitTrait]].

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> [[getAllUnitTraits]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Array]] of [[Array]]s of [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[String]], [[String]]/[[Boolean]]] - to format [["traitName1",value1], ["traitName2", value2]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code><template><title>codecomment</title><part><name index="1"/><value>/* can return:
[
	["Medic", false],
	["Engineer", false],
	["ExplosiveSpecialist", false],
	["UavHacker", false],
	["CamouflageCoef", 1],
	["AudibleCoef", 1],
	["LoadCoef", 1],
	["test", "custom"]
]
<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>*/</value></part></template>
[[private]] _playerTraits = [[getAllUnitTraits]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _unitTraits = [[getAllUnitTraits]] _unit;
[[private]] _indexes = [_unitTraits, "Medic"] [[call]] [[BIS_fnc_findNestedElement]];
[[private]] _unitCanHeal = _unitTraits [[select]] (_indexes [[select]] 0) [[select]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setUnitTrait]]
</value></part></template></root>
